Class ToolCard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.ToolCard
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Card, ToolCardEffect, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ToolCardEight, ToolCardEleven, ToolCardFive, ToolCardFour, ToolCardNine, ToolCardOne, ToolCardSeven, ToolCardSix, ToolCardTen, ToolCardThree, ToolCardTwelve, ToolCardTwo

    public abstract class ToolCard
extends java.lang.Object
implements Card, java.lang.Cloneable, ToolCardEffect
